CustomField.description: The "step" or spread between values displayed in the Boat Configurator. Example Step = 0.5 Standard = 0, Maximum = 2 will result in 0, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2 as optional values for the quantity of the product option
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The "step" or spread between values displayed in the Boat Configurator. Example Step = 0.5 Standard = 0, Maximum = 2 will result in 0, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2 as optional values for the quantity of the product option
CustomField.label: Step
